Public Function Read (offset As Long, buffer As Byte(), offsetInBuffer As Integer, count As Integer) As Long
public: long Read(long offset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offsetInBuffer, int count);
member this.Read : int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

param.name: offset
param.span: 实例中包含的值的 长值偏移量。

span.span: An long value offset into the value that is contained in the instance.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要在其中执行“复制到”操作的字节数组缓冲区。

span.span: The byte array buffer to copy into.

param.name: offsetInBuffer
param.span: 缓冲区中的一个 整数偏移量，以启动“复制到”操作。

span.span: An integer offset into the buffer to start copying into.

param.name: count
param.span: 一个 整数，表示要复制的字节数。

span.span: An integer representing the number of bytes to copy.

summary.span: 将此 实例中的字节复制到传入缓冲区中并返回复制的字节数。

span.span: Copies bytes from this instance to the passed-in buffer and returns the number of copied bytes.

returns.span: 一个 长值，表示已复制的字节数。

span.span: An long value representing the number of copied bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试进行读取 ，则会引发异常。If an attempt is made to read beyond , an exception is thrown. 如果 `count` 指定要复制的字节数超出了 `offset` 到值的末尾，则仅复制可用字节。If `count` specifies more bytes to be copied than are available from the `offset` to the end of the value, only the available bytes are copied. 如果目标缓冲区为空引用，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer is a null reference. 如果目标缓冲区无法接收所请求的字符数，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer cannot receive as many characters as requested.

summary.span: 将传入缓冲区中的字节复制到此 实例中。

span.span: Copies bytes from the passed-in buffer to this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此操作写入超过 但在中的位置 ， 则将更新以反映新的结束位置。If this operation writes to a position beyond but within , is updated to reflect the new ending position. 的值 `offsetInBuffer` 必须小于或等于 。The value of `offsetInBuffer` must be less than or equal to . 否则将引发异常。An exception is thrown otherwise. 在写入 null 值实例时，只能指定值0。Only a value of 0 can be specified when writing to a null value instance. 如果尝试写入超出 ，则会引发异常。If an attempt is made to write beyond , an exception is thrown.
